purpose of code

need to seek guidance from implications in legislative framework   held: franchising code of conduct does not evince legislative policy of striking down every franchise agreement entered into by franchisor who fails to comply with its provisions
intention of code is to protect franchisees and place obligations on franchisor to comply
failure of franchisor to comply entitles franchisee to seek to set aside agreement or to seek relief for unconscionable conduct   contract
